title: Lead the Assault
description: Take command of the first wave. Break their line or die trying.

success.text: Your men follow you into hell and back. The line breaks. The lord clasps your hand in victory.

failure.text: The assault falters. Men die under your command. The survivors won't meet your eyes.

decline.text: You refuse at the moment of truth. The captain leads instead. Your name becomes a curse word.

title: Organize the Defense
description: The enemy comes at dawn. Position troops, place reserves, and hold the walls.

success.text: Your dispositions are perfect. The defense holds with minimal losses. The lord embraces you.

failure.text: You misplaced reserves. A breach nearly costs us everything. The lord's trust is shattered.

decline.text: You refuse command at the critical hour. The lord never speaks to you again.

title: Command Your Retinue
description: You have men sworn to you now. Train them, equip them, make them worthy of your banner.

success.text: Your men become the finest in the company. Other soldiers look at them with envy.

failure.text: Your retinue is ill-disciplined and poorly trained. They shame your name in every camp.

decline.text: The lord gave you men to lead. Your refusal is incomprehensible. The retinue is disbanded.

title: Counsel the War Council
description: The lord seeks your opinion on tomorrow's battle. Speak your mind with wisdom and courage.

success.text: Your strategy wins the day. The lord calls you his right hand before the assembled host.

failure.text: Your advice leads to disaster. Men die because the lord trusted your judgment.

decline.text: The lord asked for your counsel. Your silence is seen as cowardice or treachery.

title: Demand Their Yield
description: The enemy is cornered. Ride to their camp and offer terms. Save blood if you can.

success.text: They surrender without a fight. The lord praises your silver tongue and saves his men.

failure.text: You botch the negotiation. They fight to the last. More men die than necessary.

decline.text: The lord wanted to avoid bloodshed. Your refusal costs lives. He doesn't forgive.

title: Plan the Siege
description: The castle walls are high. Design the siege works, position the engines, plan the assault.

success.text: Your siege plan is masterful. The walls fall with minimal losses. Bards will sing of this.

failure.text: Your plan fails catastrophically. The siege turns into a bloody nightmare. Your name is cursed.

decline.text: The lord entrusted you with the siege. Your refusal is unthinkable. You are dismissed in disgrace.

title: Hold the Rearguard
description: The army retreats. Command the rearguard and keep the enemy from our backs.

success.text: You bleed the enemy and save the army. The lord himself thanks you for your courage.

failure.text: The rearguard breaks. The enemy slaughters fleeing men. The defeat becomes a rout.

decline.text: You refuse the most dangerous post. No one will ever follow you again.

title: Plan the Raid
description: The lord wants enemy supplies burned and their morale broken. Plan and lead the raid.

success.text: The raid succeeds beyond expectation. Enemy supplies burn. Their troops go hungry. You're a hero.

failure.text: The raid is ambushed. Men die for nothing. The lord questions your competence.

decline.text: The lord needed someone bold and clever. Your refusal shows you are neither.

title: Command Allied Forces
description: Three lords join our host. The king appoints you to coordinate their movements in battle.

success.text: You weld three armies into one fist. Victory is total. The king himself knows your name.

failure.text: The lords won't follow your orders. The battle becomes chaos. Defeat is humiliating.

decline.text: This was the highest honor. Your refusal is inexplicable. Your career ends here.

title: Train Junior Officers
description: Young knights and squires need to learn command. Shape them into leaders.

success.text: You forge raw nobles into capable officers. The lord is proud. Your students revere you.

failure.text: You're too harsh or too soft. The young officers learn nothing. The lord is disappointed.

decline.text: The lord trusted you to pass on your knowledge. Your refusal is selfish.

title: Organize the Campaign
description: Plan supply lines, march routes, and camps for a month-long campaign into enemy lands.

success.text: Your planning is flawless. The army moves like clockwork. No man goes hungry or loses his way.

failure.text: Your planning fails. Men starve, supplies run out, the campaign collapses. It's your fault.

decline.text: This was a test of your ability to lead armies. You failed before you even started.

title: Lift the Siege
description: Our castle is besieged. Lead a sortie to break their lines and scatter their camp.

success.text: You lead a desperate charge and break the siege. The garrison roars your name from the walls.

failure.text: The sortie fails. Men die in the mud outside the gates. The siege tightens. Hope dies.

decline.text: You refuse to lead when the castle needs you most. The garrison's morale breaks.
